snippet: In-state taxes are ideal for corporate headquarters but less so for capital-intensive operations with machinery and hard assets, according to a Texas business group.
lead_paragraph: In-state taxes are ideal for corporate headquarters but less so for capital-intensive operations with machinery and hard assets, according to a Texas business group.

headline.main: For Low Taxes, It All Depends on the Business
headline.print_headline: For Low Taxes, It All Depends On the Business
